original_title: Anak Sabiran, di Balik Cahaya Gemerlapan (Sang Arsip)
overview: This film tries to read the idea of film archiving in the mind of Misbach Yusa Biran. A character who gave his entire life to preserve and reinterpret the discourse of film as a source of Indonesian film history. The archives stored are entirely in Sinematek Indonesia.
title: Behind the Flickering Light: The Archive
